pattern.name: blog_post_structure
pattern.description: Standard structure for blog posts and articles
pattern.template:
# Title
## Introduction Brief overview of what the article covers and why it's important.
## Main Content ### Section 1 Detailed information with proper explanations.
### Section 2 Additional details and examples.
## Conclusion Summary of key points and potential next steps.
## References - Source 1 - Source 2 - Official documentation links

pattern.name: documentation_pattern
pattern.template:
# Feature/Component Name
## Overview Brief description of the feature/component.
## Getting Started ### Prerequisites What is needed to use this feature.
### Installation/Setup Step-by-step instructions.
## Usage Detailed usage examples and explanations.
## Configuration Available options and settings.
## Troubleshooting Common issues and solutions.
## References - API documentation - Related resources

pattern.name: marketing_content
pattern.description: Structure for promotional and marketing materials
pattern.template:
# Headline
## Value Proposition What makes this unique and valuable.
## Key Benefits - Benefit 1 with explanation - Benefit 2 with explanation - Benefit 3 with explanation
## Features and Details Detailed information about features.
## Call to Action Clear next steps for the audience.
## Supporting Information Additional details and references.
